title: Make an Appointment | VMFH
cleaned_text: When it comes to making an appointment at Virginia Mason, you have options. You can: - Schedule by phone: Make an appointment by phone at any location by calling [206-223-6881](tel:206-223-6881), or toll-free at [888-862-2737](tel:888-862-2737). - Schedule a virtual care appointment: [Virtual care](/content/vmfhorg/en/our-services/virtual-urgent-care.html) appointments allow for a flexible location for you and your provider using video chat technology, similar to Skype or FaceTime. Make an appointment by calling (206) 223-6881 or through [MyVirginiaMason](/content/vmfhorg/en/patient-and-visitor-information/patient-information/about-our-patient-portals/myvirginiamason.html). - Self-schedule or request an appointment online: If you have already enrolled in [MyVirginiaMason](/content/vmfhorg/en/patient-and-visitor-information/patient-information/about-our-patient-portals/myvirginiamason.html), you can log in and self- schedule or request an appointment online. MyVirginiaMason is a great way to stay in touch with your Virginia Mason care team and get up-to-date medical information, all from the convenience and privacy of your own home — available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. - Schedule in person: Make an appointment with your care team while in your doctor's office. You can enroll via phone or at your next clinic appointment and get online access to request appointments, view lab results, securely message your care team, renew prescriptions and more. [Learn more](/content/vmfhorg/en/patient-and-visitor-information/patient-information/electronic-medical-records/myvirginiamason.html). Print and fill out a health history form ( [Adult](/content/dam/vmfhorg/pdf/our-hospitals/virginia-mason-medical-center/patients-visitors/adult_health_history.pdf) or [Pediatric/Adolescent](/content/dam/vmfhorg/pdf/our-hospitals/virginia-mason-medical-center/patients-visitors/Health_History_Pediatric.pdf)) and [medications and allergies form](/content/dam/vmfhorg/pdf/our-hospitals/virginia-mason-medical-center/patients-visitors/901878_Patient_Medications.pdf) and bring them with you to your appointment.
